name: Goddess And Puzzle
description: [PROLOGUE]The gods have enjoyed utopia for eons, showering the mortals with peace and prosperity. Contrary to what humans believe, the gods of the astral realm - the Norse, Egyptian, Shinto, Medieval and other figures of myth and legend - all co-exist in relative harmony, working together to enrich the lives of their creations.That is, until the breach of sinister forces from an unknown origin. They took the astral realm by surprise and with ease, overwhelming the gods who had not known war for so long. Ravaged and ragged, the defeated escaped through a wormhole in time to a parallel dimension, where they would rebuild their paradise and retake their original homeland.These immortal maidens have sworn to reclaim their former kingdoms, and have appointed you their strategist in the war to come. With the empyrean army at your disposal, you must gather and aid these lovely goddesses in their quest to save humanity.[FEATURES]COLLECT GODDESSES FROM MYTH AND LEGENDMeet titular goddesses from folklore around the world - Japanese, Norse, Medieval, Egyptian, and many more – and gather them all to fight evil.EPIC MATCH-3 PUZZLE BATTLESPit your goddesses against monsters and bosses in a battle of wits. Match elemental gems and send your armies charging in multi-colored combos!GODDESS DATING AND FASHIONAll work and no play make for an unhappy goddess! Go on dates with your goddesses and unlock outfits that will boost both their battle morale and attributes.ELEMENTAL SYSTEMYour goddesses are represented by their elements that will counter each other. Victory will rely on your team elemental setup.BUILD YOUR BASE OF NEWFOUND UTOPIADriven from your old home, you must now rebuild your stronghold to its former glory. Construct buildings, harvest resources, and build your army to protect this new world.EXPLORE THE NEW WORLDChallenge levels and discover new areas with gorgeous scenery in a world plagued by evil.FOLLOW US ON SOCIAL MEDIACome visit us on Facebook for the latest news, tips and tricks and giveaway events!
